fields.title: Building New Industrial Standard
fields.summary: On June 28, Joyou Sanitation held a launching ceremony at the Tianjin Tanggu Jinwan Hotel for a grand series of public service activities, in cooperation with the Tianjin Water Saving Management Center, entitled SAVING WATER IN CHINA.
fields.content:
Start of Joyou Sanitation''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''s SAVING WATER IN CHINA in Tianjin

 

On June 28, Joyou Sanitation held a launching ceremony at the Tianjin Tanggu Jinwan Hotel for a grand series of public service activities, in cooperation with the Tianjin Water Saving Management Center, entitled SAVING WATER IN CHINA. This was the company’s first event dedicated to the aim of saving water since it invited Ms. Guo Jingjing, the world diving champion, to announce its target at the 15th Exhibition of Kitchen & Washroom Apparatus in Shanghai on May 26, 2010.

 

During the ceremony, Ms. Han Ying, Deputy Director of the Tianjin Water Saving Management Center, commended the activities and awarding Joyou Sanitation the SAVING WATER IN CHINA flag to mark the official start of Joyou Sanitation’s SAVING WATER IN CHINA campaign.

 

This was another brand enhancing effort by Joyou Sanitation, during which the company called for the general public’s support and participation in the water saving campaign on behalf of the entire bath-ware industry. The event will help to bring home the water-saving concept to consumers in China.

 

According to Marketing Director Mr. Lin Wenwu, Joyou Sanitation, as a good corporate citizen, also bears responsibility for consumers, society, and the environment. It has always incorporated environmental protection and water-saving into its own development and integrated a water-saving, energy-saving concept into the development, design, and manufacturing of its sanitary products. He believes that the “Water-Saving Tour of China” event has broken new ground for the entire industry – not only introducing consumers to the brand-new, water-saving lifestyle which Joyou offers but also enhancing Joyou’s image as the pioneer of water saving.

fields.title: Joyou Builds First-Class Sales Service Team to Top Tianjin Market
fields.summary: A grand service car purchase ceremony was held at Joyou Sanitation’s Tianjin Marketing Center on June 28, coinciding with the launch ceremony of the “Water-Saving Tour of China” event.
fields.content:
A grand service car purchase ceremony was held at Joyou Sanitation’s Tianjin Marketing Center on June 28, coinciding with the launch ceremony of the “Water-Saving Tour of China” event.

 

At the ceremony, leaders of Tianjin Water-Saving Affairs Administration Center, Joyou Building Materials Corp, and the exclusive distributor in Tianjin handed the car keys to Joyou’s distributors in Tianjin.

 

Joyou Sanitation’s Marketing Director, Mr. Lin Wenwu, stated that 2 years after entering the Tianjin market, Joyou Sanitation had set up a powerful sales and service network in the Tianjin area, ensuring that quality products are delivered rapidly and accurately to the target consumer group. The addition of the cars to the after-sales service network definitely represents a further improvement in after-sales efficiency and the standard of service.

 

It is the first time that Joyou Sanitation has invested so much in after-sales service cars for its Tianjin distributors. The purchase will not only significantly upgrade the after-sales service standard of Tianjin Joyou Sanitation, but also underlines Tianjin Joyou’s commitment to becoming the No.1 in the Tianjin market and bringing consumers in Tianjin the “dignified water life” idea that Joyou Sanitation promotes.

fields.title: Joyou Took the Lead in Charity Donation to Guangxi
fields.summary: As one of the leading brands in China, Joyou Sanitation has always embraced a strong sense of responsibility for society while focusing on market development.
fields.content:
As one of the leading brands in China, Joyou Sanitation has always embraced a strong sense of responsibility for society while focusing on market development. It has played an active role in charity affairs and pioneered the charity cause in China’s sanitary and bath-ware industry.

 

Great enterprises always exhibit their social responsibility in the face of terrible disasters, just as true heroes always stand up against raging torrents. Having suffered the severest drought for 60 years, Guangxi suddenly found itself in a serious rainstorm. Word quickly spread to the rest of China, however, and the Chinese people once again pulled together to fight this natural disaster. At the car delivery ceremony during the Guangxi Marketing Summit on June 27, Joyou Sanitation held a charity donation event for Guangxi Laibin Experimental High School, in order to spread the seed of hope to the storm-stricken area and help the Guangxi people overcome their difficulties.

 

Mr. Shi Fang, headmaster of Guangxi Laibin Experimental High School, presented a banner and a letter of gratitude to the Guangxi Marketing Center of Joyou Sanitation. Mr. Shi said that schools carried our hope and our future. Joyou Sanitation joined hands with students in the storm-stricken area to build a dam of love to protect the hope of life. This present of love, said the headmaster, will be cherished forever by the students of Guangxi Laibin Experimental High School.

 

Joyou Sanitation’s Marketing Director, Mr. Lin Wenwu, said that Joyou had been concerned with conditions in the disaster-stricken areas. When they heard of the serious storm in Guangxi, Joyou Building Materials Group and Guangxi Joyou Sanitation Marketing Center decided to do their bit by organizing a series of donation events together. Charity and mutual help are not only the traditional virtues of the Chinese, but also the social responsibility and obligation of enterprises, said Mr. Lin.

 

Joyou Sanitation sincerely hopes that this donation will trigger more donations from society, thereby encouraging more people to participate in charity events and help those in need. Let us do our bit to deliver warmth, love, and hope to the disaster-stricken families.

fields.title: Grand Opening of 2010 Guangxi Marketing Summit of Joyou Sanitation
fields.summary: June 26, 2010, saw the grand opening of Joyou Sanitation’s Guangxi Marketing Summit at the Dongmeng Hotel in Nanning.
fields.content:
Feasting on Glory at the Summit:
Grand Opening of 2010 Guangxi Marketing Summit of Joyou Sanitation

 

June 26, 2010, saw the grand opening of Joyou Sanitation’s Guangxi Marketing Summit at the Dongmeng Hotel in Nanning. The “Feasting on Glory at the Summit” was attended by Lin Wenwu, Marketing Director of Joyou Sanitation, Lan Guang, Deputy Marketing Director, Yao Xiyun, Marketing Director Assistant, Guo Chunhua, Regional Manager Joyou Southwest China, Fang Jincheng, Joyou exclusive distributor in Guangxi, as well as outstanding Joyou distributors across the counties and cities of Guangxi, and journalists from various specialist media organizations.

 

At the summit, Fang Jincheng, exclusive distributor of Joyou sanitary and bath-ware in Guangxi, summed up the work of Joyou Sanitation’s Guangxi Marketing Center over the past three years and presented the development plan for the latter half of 2010. He reported that the Guangxi Marketing Center would be adjusting its development strategy in order to solve various problems that have been hampering the company’s steady development based on its current network and brand recognition. The key measures that the company will undertake include strengthening its supply capacity, formulating and implementing more practical, effective market policies, increasing ad spending, reinforcing brand promotion, enhancing sales personnel training, improving the after-sales service system, and establishing a market monitoring system.

 

In his speech, Mr. Lin Wenwu, Joyou Sanitation’s Marketing Director, declared that Joyou Sanitation would make bigger strides into the domestic market in 2010 by strengthening the advertising presence and further developing the market and the brand. He also expressed his encouragement and support for capable distributors to explore the consumer network, enhance the marketing compatibility of the distributor team, and open up a wider field for Joyou to develop.

 

In order to prompt more outstanding distributors to develop the Joyou brand, Joyou Sanitation’s Guangxi Marketing Center held a grand car-awarding ceremony, during which each distributor showing courage, shrewdness and outstanding performance was awarded a Wuling car. The award will no doubt stimulate distributors to strive further to develop Joyou’s market in Guangxi.

 

Faced with fierce competition in the sanitary and bath-ware market, Joyou Sanitation’s Guangxi Marketing Center will strive to build Joyou into the No.1 brand for sanitary and bath-ware in Guangxi – taking Joyou to new heights with its innovation, passion, and hard work.

fields.title: Charity with Passion in Jiangxi
fields.summary: On July 17, Joyou Sanitation’s Jiangxi Marketing Center held a grand charity donation in front of Xi Ying Men Mart in Nanchang City entitled “Charity with Passion in Jiangxi”.
fields.content:
Joyou Held Donation Ceremony for Economically Challenged Students in Nanchang, Jiangxi

 

On July 17, Joyou Sanitation’s Jiangxi Marketing Center held a grand charity donation in front of Xi Ying Men Mart in Nanchang City entitled “Charity with Passion in Jiangxi”. The donation ceremony was attended by Lin Wenwu, Marketing Director of Joyou Sanitation, Xue Rong, National Sales Director, Lan Guang, Deputy Sales Director, Chen Jingyuan, Regional Manager Middle China, Chen Tian, exclusive distributor of Joyou in Jiangxi, and distributors across the counties and cities of Jiangxi.

 

At the ceremony, Joyou Sanitation’s Marketing Director, Lin Wenwu, donated 1% of the profit resulting from this activity to Wang Juru, Deputy Secretary-General of the Jiangxi Youth Development Foundation. Ms. Wang was warmly awarded as she awarded the donation to two student representatives attending the ceremony, Huang Hu and Hu Junwen.

 

It is reported that this summer’s flood in Wuzhou, Jiangxi, destroyed the homes of many students. As the new semester will begin after the summer vacation, those families in Wuzhou that were already badly off before the flood now face even more greater financial difficulties trying to pay their kids’ tuition fees.

As well making profit from society, enterprises must also play their part in shouldering responsibility for society. In response to the “1% charity” student-aid program organized by the CYL Jiangxi Committee, the Jiangxi Committee of the Chinese Association for Promoting Democracy and the Jiangxi Youth Development Foundation, the Jiangxi Marketing Center of Joyou Sanitation held a series of “Love Aid for Outstanding Students” as part of its “1% charity” drive from July 17 to July 30, donating 1% of the resulting profit to the poverty-stricken students in Jiangxi.

 

“As a good corporate citizen, Joyou believes it has a social obligation and responsibility to actively participate in local charity activities”, says Marketing Director Lin Wenwu.

 

The activity marks a further practical contribution made by Joyou Sanitation to the charity cause. It demonstrates that Joyou not only embraces its role as an industrial leader but also actively shoulders its responsibility for society.

fields.title: Power and Prosperity of Joyou in Shaanxi
fields.summary: Joyou Sanitation’s Shaanxi Marketing Center held its 2010 Conference for Outstanding Regional Distributors of Joyou in Shaanxi at the Yu Long Hotel in Xi’an from July 16 to July 18, 2010.
fields.content:
Grand Opening of 2010 Conference for Outstanding Regional Distributors of Joyou in Shaanxi

 

Joyou Sanitation’s Shaanxi Marketing Center held its 2010 Conference for Outstanding Regional Distributors of Joyou in Shaanxi at the Yu Long Hotel in Xi’an from July 16 to July 18, 2010. Cai Jilin, CEO of Joyou Sanitation, Gu Huanyu, brand advisor, Huang Zhirong, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in the Shaanxi region, and other outstanding distributors across the counties and cities of the Shaanxi area attended this major event in the sanitary and bath-ware industry in Xi’an.

 

At the summit, Huang Zhirong summed up the company’s marketing and brand promotion activities in the Shaanxi market over the past three years and introduced the focus areas for the latter half of 2010. He announced that Joyou’s Xi’an Marketing Center would be expanding its current marketing team, speeding up team construction, building a dominant sales team in the Xi’an sanitary and bath-ware industry, further developing the Shaanxi market, opening up new nodes in the Shaanxi sales network, and occupying more market space in order to reinforce Joyou’s leading position in Northwest China and build the Shaanxi market into the leading sector of the Northwest China market.

 

Joyou Sanitation’s CEO, Cai Jilin, followed by stating that the group had formulated its brand promotion and market operation strategies for Joyou Sanitation, which would enable it to deal more effectively with competition in the industry, to develop the domestic sanitary and bath-ware market, to enhance the Joyou brand’s influence and recognition level, and to improve Joyou’s MOR and market share. The group will also launch advertising campaigns on CCTV and other influential media in order to reinforce its online brand promotion activities across well-known networks, while enhancing its positive profile with consumers, and laying a firm foundation for future sales.

 

Joyou Sanitation’s brand advisor, Gu Huanyu, gave the Shaanxi distributors a lecture on brand promotion and market operations. Many distributors in the Shaanxi area said that this lecture helped tremendously with their sales efforts in the latter half of the year and fueled them with more determination and confidence to build Joyou into a stronger and more competitive enterprise.

 

Over the past three years, Joyou’s outstanding distributors in Shaanxi have scored amazing achievements at a rapid speed. Many excellent sales teams and individuals have emerged across the counties and cities of Shaanxi and achieved fantastic results. In order to demonstrate its gratitude for and affirmation of the support and help provided by its excellent distributors over the past 3 years, the Shaanxi Marketing Center of Joyou Sanitary & Bathware prepared special awards to be presented to these distributors.

 

At the award ceremony, the group’s senior managers presented awards to the Shaanxi region’s outstanding distributors. Li Hong, a top marketing talent in Shaanxi, said on behalf of the award-winning distributors that they would work more closely with Shaanxi Marketing Center in the latter half of 2010 to build Joyou Sanitation into the leading brand in the Shaanxi market.

fields.title: Prosperous Shaanxi, Splendid Joyou
fields.summary: From July 17 to July 20, Joyou Sanitation’s Shaanxi Marketing Center held a grand opening event for its flagship store at Easy Home, north of the 3rd Ring Road, Xi’an city.
fields.content:
World Diving Champion Guo Jingjing Attended Opening of Joyou Flagship Store

 

From July 17 to July 20, Joyou Sanitation’s Shaanxi Marketing Center held a grand opening event for its flagship store at Easy Home, north of the 3rd Ring Road, Xi’an city. As a mark of Joyou’s robust development in Northwest China, the event created a tremendous impact on the industry and reflected the tremendous brand strength and esteem enjoyed by Joyou Sanitation.

 

The opening of Joyou Sanitation’s Daminggong flagship store north of the 3rd Ring was attended by Chen Yue, Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the Shaanxi People’s Congress, Sun Jiangqiao, Executive Director and Chairman’s Assistant of Xi’an Daminggong Building Materials & Decoration Co. Ltd., Guo Jingjing, the Joyou brand’s spokesperson, Yang Jian, VP of Joyou Sanitation, Lin Wenwu, Marketing Director, Huang Zhirong, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in the Shaanxi region, outstanding distributors in the Shaanxi counties and cities, and reporters from Shanxi TV station, Chinese Merchants, Xian.qq.com, the home decoration channel of Sohu.com, etc.

 

Xi’an Joyou Pushed Frontier Northward to Build Top Market Sector in Northwest China

 

In his inauguration speech, Mr. Huang Zhirong, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in Shaanxi, predicted that the opening of Joyou’s Daminggong flagship store would significantly raise Joyou’s overall image and service capacity in the northwestern market, enabling Joyou Sanitation to bring “water life” to the consumers of Northwest China.

 

Yang Jian, VP of Joyou Sanitation, pointed out the leading position and radiating function of the Shaanxi Marketing Center for the northwestern market. The opening of Joyou’s flagship store here would help enhance the brand’s market recognition and esteem in Northwest China and strengthen Joyou Sanitation’s influence and competitiveness.

 

World Diving Champion Guo Jingjing, Joyous brand ambassador also expressed her willingness to introduce this reliable, water-saving and eco-friendly brand to all consumers in Xi’an.

 

At the opening ceremony, Li Zhongsheng, the Secretary-General of the Shaanxi Water Association, handed the “Water-Saving Tour around China” flag to Joyou Sanitation’s Shaanxi Marketing Center to mark the launch of the charity program’s third stop in Xi’an.

 

The grand opening of the flagship store in the north of the 3rd Ring of Xi’an city consolidated Joyou’s leading position in Northwest China’s sanitary and bath-ware market. At the same time, it marks the commitment of Joyou’s Xi’an branch to bring the idea of dignified water life to consumers in Xi’an with its brand-new service concepts and powerful service teams.

 

On-Spot Promotion Attracted 1000 Buyers in Block Sale

 

To reward the love and support of Xi’an consumers for Joyou Sanitation, Joyou collaborated with Xian.qq.com and teambuy.com.cn, etc in presenting numerous sets of bargain products, which attracted many team buyers. During the opening sale, Joyou also launched an unprecedented promotion campaign for consumers by offering a large number of discount products. It is reported that sales at Joyou’s flagship store soared to over a million RMB in one day.

fields.title: Special Offers for Shaanxi Consumers with World Champion’s Signing Session
fields.summary: World Diving Champion Guo Jingjing’s Signing Session at Joyou Franchised Store
fields.content:
World Diving Champion Guo Jingjing’s Signing Session at Joyou Franchised Store

 

To express its gratitude for the long-standing support and love of local Xi’an consumers, Joyou Sanitation’s Shaanxi Marketing Center collaborated with the Decoration Mall operator Easy Home on July 18, 2010 in hosting the “Prosperous Shaanxi, Splendid Joyou” promotion with a signing session held by world diving champion Guo Jingjing in Joyou’s franchised store at Easy Home, north of the 2nd Ring, Xi’an city.

 

World diving champion Guo Jingjing visited Easy Home to lend her support for Joyou’s sanitary and bath-ware products. She interacted with consumers and posed with fans for pictures, which raised the signing session to an exciting climax.


When asked about the popularity of Joyou sanitary and bath-ware products, Huang Zhirong, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in Shaanxi, said that by hosting Guo Jingjing’s signing session, Joyou and Easy Home not only aim to enhance consumer awareness of Joyou sanitary and bath-ware products in Xi’an, but also to showcase the influence and charm of the Joyou brand, which will enrich the sanitary industry in Xi’an with new elements combining art and fashion, while bringing Xi’an consumers quality sanitary space and a dignified water life, thus acting as a trendsetter for the Xi’an sanitary industry.

fields.title: 2nd Chinese Real Estate Developer Procurement Commission Forum & Forum for Chinese Low-Carbon Construction Brands Opened
fields.summary: On Aug. 6, the 2nd Chinese Developer Procurement Commission Forum & Forum for Chinese Low-Carbon Construction Brands was officially opened in Xiamen.
fields.content:
On Aug. 6, the 2nd Chinese Developer Procurement Commission Forum & Forum for Chinese Low-Carbon Construction Brands was officially opened in Xiamen. The forum was sponsored by the Joyou Building Materials Group and co-initiated by six official, nationwide associations including the China Consumers’ Association, the China Building Materials Industries Association, the China Real Estate Association, and the China Building Decoration Association, as well as three overseas listed companies including sina.com and China Real Estate Information Corp..

 

The forum’s keynote speakers included Ding Zuyu, Executive Director of China Real Estate Information Corp., Cai Jianshe, Chairman of Joyou Sanitation, Lai Zengxiang, Deputy Director of the Interior Decoration Branch of China Building Decoration Association, and Yu Yingzheng, VP of Real Estate Merchants Corp.. The talks included “reflections on a low-carbon era across China: how low-carbon residence started in China”, as well as “maximizing profit under heavy policy pressure: how to reduce procurement costs”. The forum attracted the attention and participation of hundreds of developers, leading enterprises in the domestic building material manufacturing industry, and various media organizations.

 

This forum established a win-win platform for real estate developers, low-carbon building material manufacturers, and model unit designers. It has also become a convenient and highly efficient communication channel and a showcase for brands.

fields.title: Experiencing the Charms of Joyou
fields.summary: Over 30 leaders and journalists of the “Nan’an Tour of National Key Internet Media Delegation” visited Joyou during the afternoon of July 28.
fields.content:
Over 30 leaders and journalists of the “Nan’an Tour of National Key Internet Media Delegation” visited Joyou during the afternoon of July 28. Executive Director Hong Huangyao was on hand to warmly receive the media representatives.

 

Hong Huangyao first thanked the journalists from across China for their coverage and support of Joyou Sanitation and extended his sincere welcome to every member of the delegation. He then accompanied the delegation’s leaders and journalists around the Joyou Sanitary Life Experience Gallery, where they were able to appreciate Joyou’s rich brand heritage and outstanding development over the past three decades. The visitors were also informed about the company’s innovative endeavors and pursuit for excellence, and were able to experience the charms of Joyou sanitary and bath-ware which focus on “health, romance, fashion, and environmental protection”.

 

The theme of the Joyou Sanitary Life Experience Gallery is “dignified life with water”. Centering around water, the gallery’s interior is carefully arranged to comprehensively and clearly exhibit all the sanitary products and new technologies which Joyou Sanitation has independently developed and designed over the past three decades – giving a clear representation of the company’s strength and the quality of its products.

 

After visiting the gallery, the media delegation was shown around the faucet manufacturing and automatic polishing workshops. The entire faucet manufacturing process was explained, focusing in particular on the numerous cutting-edge technologies and methods involved. Media journalists from all over China were fascinated by the exquisite sanitary products on display and the cutting-edge production processes. They were deeply impressed by Joyou’s distinctive corporate culture and the tremendous achievements it has made in brand development and manufacturing techniques.

 

Many journalists stated that Joyou Sanitation was a true leader of the domestic sanitary and bath-ware industry and promised to spread Joyou’s idea of “enjoy harmony with water” to consumers across China.

fields.title: Star Service for Tens of Thousands of Households
fields.summary: Joyou held its 2010 Joyou Sanitation After-Sale Service Training Session at the Yong Chang Hotel in Nan’an city on July 29
fields.content:
Grand Opening of 2010 Joyou Sanitation After-Sale Service Training Session

 

In order to further enhance the after-sale service quality of Joyou’s sanitary products and the strong reputation of the Joyou brand, Joyou held its 2010 Joyou Sanitation After-Sale Service Training Session at the Yong Chang Hotel in Nan’an city on July 29 with the theme “Star Service for Tens of Thousands of Households”. Present at the session were 10 company executives, including Lin Wenwu, Marketing Director of Joyou Sanitation, Wang Xiangqing, Deputy Marketing Director, and Li Qun, Manager of the Customer Department, together with over 150 outstanding after-sale service personnel from across China.

 

The training session opened with a speech by Wang Xiangqing. Mr. Wang began by extending a warm welcome to all the outstanding after-sale service personnel, before presenting an analysis of the competition in the sanitary market. In the era of homogeneous competition, as Mr. Wang pointed out, quality after-sale service is the best promotion for future sales. It is an indispensable method to enhance consumer satisfaction and loyalty and can greatly improve the reputation of the company and the brand image. At the end of his speech, Mr. Wang said that the company would continue to enhance its after-sale service standards and expressed his hope that the after-sale service personnel would also be able to enhance their service quality after the session.

 

The session lasted two days. During the theoretical learning session on July 29, engineers of all production processes and Joyou’s departmental managers gave the after-sale service staff detailed theoretical information, installation tips, and after-sale maintenance hints for such company products as the ceramic bathroom, showers, stainless water tanks, faucets, shower enclosures, and intelligent toilets. This gave the trainees a complete picture of the technical advantages and maintenance methods for Joyou sanitary products and thus laid a solid foundation for the trainees to offer perfect service for prospective consumers. 

 

During the morning session on July 30, the trainees witnessed Joyou’s manufacturing techniques and were shown around the Joyou Sanitary Life Experience Gallery in the company of their colleagues. The trainees witnessed Joyou’s cutting-edge technologies and learnt about the company’s development over the past three decades.

 

At the product information and maintenance team meeting during the afternoon session, leaders of the development, product, customer, and sanitary ceramics departments were on hand to answer questions from the trainees. The trainees actively sought advice from the department managers concerning problems they came across during their work. The session also provided company leaders with an insight into the real demands of consumers, and will undoubtedly lead to more sanitary products meeting the actual needs of consumers.

 

All trainees passed the test of the two-day theoretical and technical training session and achieved good results. At the end of the session, Marketing Director Lin Wenwu awarded the trainees with certificates and expressed his hope that the trainees would put what they learned into practice – thus serving consumers better, enhancing Joyou’s market reputation and building the Joyou brand into a national sanitary brand.

 

The session not only provided the after-sale service personnel with an opportunity to improve their skills and know-how concerning Joyou products, but also set up a platform where they can communicate with and learn from each other, share experience, and learn how to improve their performance in future.

fields.title: Feasting on Glory at the Summit
fields.summary: The 2010 Chongqing Wanzhou Marketing Summit of Joyou Sanitation entitled “Feasting on Glory at the Summit” was held at the Chang Jiang Hotel in Wanzhou, Chongqing, from July 22 to July 24.
fields.content:
Grand Opening of 2010 Chongqing Wanzhou Marketing Summit of Joyou Sanitation

 

The 2010 Chongqing Wanzhou Marketing Summit of Joyou Sanitation entitled “Feasting on Glory at the Summit” was held at the Chang Jiang Hotel in Wanzhou, Chongqing, from July 22 to July 24.

 

More than 50 distributors from all over Chongqing were invited to attend the important event and discuss the company’s blueprint for success. Present at the summit were such leaders as Marketing Director Lin Wenwu, Southwest China Regional Manager Guo Chunhua, Brand Director Ke Guoyu, Trainer Yang Kaiguang, and Joyou’s exclusive distributor in Chongqing, Wang Shunli.

 

At the summit, Mr. Wang Shunli first extended his warm welcome to all company managers and the distributors in Chongqing. He pointed out that the company would enhance its promotional activities in the latter half of 2010 by strengthening its close ties with the media, further elevating the competitiveness and market image of Joyou’s products, and assisting the development of outstanding distributors in a planned and targeted manner. “Joyou has been developing very rapidly these two years. As long as you can keep up with our speed of development, we can offer you whatever support you need!” said Wang Shunli.

 

Following Mr. Wang’s speech, Southwest China Regional Manager Guo Chunhua summed up the work in sales and brand promotion in the Chongqing market during 2010. He stated that distributors in Chongqing were continuing to expand in number and scale in 2010, and that the company had scored significant achievements with the support and efforts of all distributors. He went on to analyze the current condition and problems in the Chongqing market and pointed out that as competition nowadays lies in team building, funding, the brand, and innovation, it was necessary for the company to gradually shift its mode of operation from that of a family enterprise and toward more team cooperation. He therefore encouraged distributors to fight against the clock for better locations, to open bigger stores with a more favorable market image, to focus on developing the market and closely following trends, so as to build Joyou into a dominant brand in the Chongqing area. He also stated that the company would establish special teams to inspect distributors across China, and dismiss those distributors who failed to change despite warnings.

 

Finally, Marketing Director Lin Wenwu analyzed the trend of the sanitary industry and discussed effective marketing strategies with the Chongqing distributors to achieve win-win results. He pointed out that Sichuan and Chongqing were important markets for the company, and Joyou would be giving more support to distributors in these two key markets – especially to cooperative and resourceful distributors – to make them bigger and stronger. By introducing healthy competition and further specifying and regulating the market, we have every confidence that Joyou Sanitation can be built into the dominant brand in Chongqing.

 

The meeting was held in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. All distributors were in high spirits and voiced their ideas freely. They put forward a lot of practical advice for the development of the Chongqing market, which fully reflected how determined and confident Joyou’s Chongqing Marketing Center was of becoming a stronger, bigger and more specialized player in the market.

 

After the meeting, distributors from all over Chongqing visited the Joyou’s Wanzhou franchised store. The simple, elegant decoration, clear layout, and cozy lighting created a pleasant shopping environment which effectively highlights the essence of the Joyou brand. Distributors were so excited that they could not help taking out their cameras and shooting pictures of the store, in order to replicate its success in their local areas.

fields.title: Diving Queen Shaking Up Henan
fields.summary: Guo Jingjing Signing Session to Celebrate Anniversary of Joyou Phoenix Flagship Store
fields.content:
Guo Jingjing Signing Session to Celebrate Anniversary of Joyou Phoenix Flagship Store

 

Mid-summer seems to offer the perfect backdrop for Joyou to create a stir in the market. On Aug. 8, 2010, the Joyou Franchised Store in Phoenix Town celebrated its anniversary with towering arches, colorful banners, stacks of bouquets, attention-grabbing music, lion dancing, and spectacular fireworks. Many distinguished guests were invited to witness this significant event.

 

The anniversary celebrations and Guo Jingjing’s signing session at Joyou’s flagship store in Phoenix Town were attended by Hong Mouqu, the Standing Deputy President of the Quanzhou Chamber of Commerce of Zhengzhou city, Ya Yishan, Party Secretariat of Xinshan Co. Ltd. of Henan, Yang Jian, the VP of Joyou Building Materials Corp, Guo Jingjing, spokesperson for the Joyou sanitary brand, market advisor Lin Jin, National Sales Director Xue Rong, Qiao Dong, Marketing Director Phoenix Town of Xinshan Co. Ltd., Wang Zhenkai, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in Henan, representative distributors from across the counties and cities of Henan, and media journalists from Zhengzhou TV and Zhengzhou Evening.

At the ceremony, Mr. Wang Zhenkai, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in Henan first extended his warm welcome to all guests on behalf of Joyou Sanitation’s Henan Marketing Center, and expressed the company’s determination to uphold the Joyou spirit of unswerving endeavor, high efficiency and innovation. He stressed that the company was forging ahead and joining hands with distributors all over Henan to build Joyou into the No.1 brand in the high-end sanitary market of Henan. Moreover, he remarked that the anniversary celebrations marked the comprehensive upgrading of Joyou’s overall image and service capacity in Henan, and that the company would strive to bring the concept of “life with water” to all consumers in Henan.

 

Mr. Yangjian, VP of the Joyou Building Materials Group, offered a comprehensive and objective analysis of the industry’s overall situation and summed up Joyou’s development since entering the Henan market. He traced the past 32 years of development since the founding of the company in 1979 and pointed out that having built a new brand into a leading one in the industry with a solid sales network and steady sales performance, Joyou had every confidence it could seize the advantage of a stock market listing and build Joyou Sanitation into the No.1 brand in China in the sanitary market.

 

In an upbeat speech, Mr. Qiao Dong, Marketing Director of Xinshan Co. Ltd. in Phoenix Town, praised the exquisite and elegant design of both the exterior and interior of Joyou’s franchised store in Phoenix. Its distinctive European flavor captured the essential art of sanitary space design and was one of Phoenix Town’s best exhibition spaces for sanitary products. Guo Jingjing, spokesperson for the Joyou brand, remarked that water-saving was not an empty promise but had to be realized in practice. Everyone should therefore be more careful when using water, putting it to better use and focusing on every water-saving detail.

 

Celebrating the Anniversary with the World and Striving for Success in Henan

It is reported that this promotion was unprecedented in offering the most product varieties, the biggest discounts, and the widest array of categories in the decades of history of the company. Armed with a card with Guo Jingjing’s signature, each consumer could buy a gilded faucet with Guo Jingjing’s signature on it.

fields.title: Jingjing Shaking Up Henan by Promoting Popular Sports
fields.summary: Aug. 8, 2010 is the second anniversary of the opening of the Beijing Olympics and the second “National Keep Fit Day” in China.
fields.content:
Brand Ambassador Guo Jingjing Triggered “Jogging for Health”

 

Aug. 8, 2010 is the second anniversary of the opening of the Beijing Olympics and the second “National Keep Fit Day” in China. In response to the instructions of the State Council on the “National Keep Fit Day” and the notice of the General Administration of Sports on the organization of a 2010 “National Keep Fit Day”, the first “Zhengzhou Evening-Joyou Sanitary Cup” Keep Fit Jogging event for 10,000 people was launched at the Phoenix Building Material Mall in Zhengzhou, under the co-sponsorship of Joyou Sanitation, the Zhengzhou Administration of Sports, and Zhengzhou Evening. Olympic diving champion and spokesperson for Joyou sanitary products, Ms. Guo Jingjing, was invited to fire the starting pistol and launch the event.

 

Those present at the Phoenix Square included Shi Qixin, Deputy Secretariat of the Zhengzhou CYL Commission, Zhao Junfeng and Chen Lai’an, Deputy Directors of the Zhouzhou Administration of Sports, Xu Weichao, Chief of the Young Farmers Division of the Zhengzhou CYL Commission, Ya Yishan, Secretariat of the Party Commission of Xinshan Industrial Co. of Henan, Yang Jian, VP of the Joyou Group, the General Director of Joyou Sanitation’s Henan Marketing Center, Qiao Dong, the Director of Operations at Phoenix City, Shi Dadong, the Editor-in-Chief of Zhengzhou Evening, as well as thousands of joggers from Zhengzhou, Kaifeng and Luoyang. The square was a sea of faces and sounds.

 

Upon Guo Jingjing’s pistol shot, the participants started from Phoenix City, jogged 5.6km along Zhengbian Road, Yufeng Road, Zhongzhou Street, and Jinshui Road, and returned to Phoenix City after nearly an hour. At the end of the event, the champion, runner-up, second runner-up, and the 4th to 15th place holders were awarded titles, cash, electrical appliances, and other gifts.

fields.title: Sparkling Hunan, Splendid Joyou
fields.summary: Under the heading of “Sparkling Hunan, Splendid Joyou”, the 2010 Hunan Summit of Joyou Sanitation’s Outstanding Marketing Talents was held at the Xin Du Hotel in Changsha city, Hunan province, from Aug.
fields.content:
Grand Opening of 2010 Hunan Summit of Joyou Sanitation’s Outstanding Marketing Talents

 

Under the heading of “Sparkling Hunan, Splendid Joyou”, the 2010 Hunan Summit of Joyou Sanitation’s Outstanding Marketing Talents was held at the Xin Du Hotel in Changsha city, Hunan province, from Aug. 11 to 12, 2010. The summit was attended by Cai Jianshe, Chairman of the Joyou Building Materials Group, Marketing Director Lin Wenwu, Deputy Sales Director Lan Guang, Sales Director’s Assistant Yao Xiyun, Regional Manager for Mid-South China Chen Jingyuan, exclusive distributors for the Hunan area Huang Jinguo and Huang Zhixian, and distributors from counties and cities across Hunan, as well as around a dozen media journalists.

 

Battle for Consumers in Hunan

 

At 8 am on Aug. 11, the 2010 Hunan Summit of Joyou Sanitation’s Outstanding Marketing Talents opened with a trailer for Joyou Sanitation’s 2010 Annual Distributor Forum.

 

 

Mr. Huang Zhixian, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in Hunan, gave an impassioned opening speech. He reported that Joyou Sanitation’s Hunan Marketing Center had worked closely with Hunan’s distributors over the past three years. They have grown up together and struggled together for Joyou in the Hunan market where challenges and opportunities exist side by side. Looking ahead to the latter half of 2010, he introduced the marketing methods and market exploration plan for 2010. He pointed out that in the latter half of 2010, the company would implement its strategies with new methods and measures, carry out the work with innovative ideas and a high degree of energy, and realize the five “improves”, i.e. to improve team quality, sales performance, network quality, differentiated development of the brand, and the nuclear marketing competitiveness, so as to develop the luxury sanitary product market in Hunan and build Joyou into the No.1 brand in Hunan’s sanitary industry.

Marketing Director Lin Wenwu summed up the work of the first 6 months of 2010 and elaborated the marketing and brand promotion plan for the latter half of the year. As luxury sanitary products from the USA and Japan are competing with increasing intensity, and mid-to-high end brands are developing rapidly, Joyou Sanitation should speed up its product R&D and brand promotion while continuing to improve its sales channels and the training of its marketing and distributor teams. In this way, it can build up a highly efficient, effective, and capable marketing team, increase the market share and MOR of Joyou, and achieve a win-win relation with its distributors.

 

Following the speech, Mr. Yan Zhimin, an award-winning lecturer with rich practical experience, was invited to deliver a lecture on the marketing and management of building material stores with special emphasis on practical solutions to the problems that local distributors often come across in sales, market expansion, and brand promotion. Mr. Yan also provided systematic training on brand strategy and sales. Mr. Yan’s excellent lecture was warmly received by all the distributors.

 

Marketing Elites Set Examples for Distributors

Xie Guangming, winner of the 2010 Joyou prize for brand awareness, remarked, “We must all put out heart and life into the Joyou Sanitation cause. It is my firm belief that as long as we fight together, we can raise Joyou to new heights.”

 

Car-Awarding Ceremony

 

To encourage Hunan distributors to enhance the Joyou brand, the group held a grand “Sparkling Hunan, Splendid Joyou” 2010 Car-Awarding Ceremony for Joyou’s Outstanding Marketing Talents in Hunan at the Mawangdui Building Material Mall, Changsha city, Hunan province on Aug. 12. Mr. Huang Zhixian, Joyou’s exclusive distributor in Hunan, said that the after-sale service cars would elevate Joyou’s brand image, consolidate its leading position in the market, and give a powerful push to Joyou’s brand promotion in Hunan. Meanwhile, the cars will comprehensively enhance Joyou’s service standards and provide better service for consumers in Hunan.

fields.title: Formal Launching of “Joyou Water-Saving Campaign for 10,000 Households” and “Golden Toilet” Prize for Chinese Water-Saving Sanitary Products (Toilets)
fields.summary: The 2010 “Beijing Urban Service Administration Radio”, “Joyou Water-Saving Toilet Reform for 10,000 Households”, and “Golden Toilet” prize for Chinese water-saving sanitary products (toilets)
fields.content:
The 2010 “Beijing Urban Service Administration Radio”, “Joyou Water-Saving Toilet Reform for 10,000 Households”, and “Golden Toilet” prize for Chinese water-saving sanitary products (toilets) were launched at the Multi-Functional Hall of the Beijing Broadcasting Tower on Aug. 25. The event was co-sponsored by Beijing Urban Service Administration Radio, the Chinese Building Decoration Association, the Joyou Building Materials Group, the Beijing Water-Saving Administration Center, the Kitchen & Bathroom Decoration Division of the Chinese Building Decoration Association, and the National Sanitary Ceramic Quality Inspection Center.

 

China suffers from severe water shortage and is one of the 13 countries with the fewest water resources in the world. Over 400 cities across China suffer from water shortage, of which 108 suffer from severe water shortage. Beijing is also one of the cities facing a severe water shortage. It is reported that toilets account for 50% to 60% of total household water consumption, while in many cities 2 out of every 10 toilets suffer from leaking, dripping, rimming, and other water-related problems. A leaking toilet can waste 0.8 cubic meters of water every 24 hours.

 

In view of this situation, Beijing Urban Service Administration Radio partnered with the Chinese Building Decoration Association and the Joyou Building Materials Group (amongst others) to launch the “Joyou Water-Saving Toilet Reform” initiative. Beijing Urban Service Administration Radio hopes to shoulder its social responsibility as a mainstream media provider and guide public opinion in a more healthy direction. By organizing such charity events, Beijing Urban Service Administration Radio hopes to motivate citizens to pay more attention to saving water and heighten their awareness for the importance of water-saving.

 

The “Joyou Water-Saving Toilet Reform for 10,000 Households” will last three months. The organizing committee sent out a professional toilet repair team from 6 well-known enterprises to carry out free inspections of toilet water consumption volume for tens of thousands of Beijing residents and offer maintenance advice and service to solve such problems as toilet leaking, dripping, and rimming. Many households directly benefited from the effective water-saving reform service.

 

The Chinese Building Decoration Association will also be hosting a “Golden Toilet Prize” for Chinese sanitary products (toilets), as well as the “Top 10 Most Popular Brands in China”. The results will be released at an award ceremony in mid October. All citizens taking part will have the chance to win the lucky award from the organizing committee.

 

The Joyou Group has always strived to build up a first-rate Chinese sanitary brand of international renown. It has adopted the brand concept of “dignified life with water” and has won many awards and titles such as the “National Model Unit for Industrial Manufacturing Resource-Saving”, and the “National Green Faucet”. Joyou’s water-saving concept is perfectly echoed by the water- and energy-saving concept promoted by this “water-saving toilet reform” initiative.

 

It is reported that during the course of the toilet reform initiative, the organizing committee will also be carrying out water-saving activities in communities and at domestic decoration malls. Citizens can participate in the activities by answering questions, playing games, participating in lotteries, and interacting with hosts of Beijing Urban Service Administration Radio. The campaign promises fun, knowledge and gifts for the lucky winners.

fields.title: Interview with Mr. Jianshe CAI, CEO and major shareholder of Joyou AG
fields.summary: Interview concerncing the takeover bid of Grohe AG.
fields.content:
Is the intended GROHE takeover offer a friendly takeover?
As a member of Joyou´s management board I have to stay neutral here. Joyou AG´s Management Board and Supervisory Board will assess the situation and publish their advice to the shareholders in due course, and can only issue a formal opinion after the tender offer has been made.
As major shareholders, me and my son intend to enter into a long-term partnership agreement with Grohe Holding GmbH. It is currently planned that we will contribute the major part of our shares in Joyou AG into Grohe Asia AG, the share holding vehicle, against an issuance of new shares. Thereby we would be locking together the two key anchor investors, Grohe and the Cai family, into a partnership aimed at creating value for both Grohe and Joyou.
Personally I believe that this partnership brings synergetic value to both companies by the potential future cooperative structure, and increased participation of Grohe.

Will you support this offer and recommend shareholders to sell at this low price?
Joyou AG´s Management Board and Supervisory Board will assess the situation and publish their advice to the shareholders in due course. The price of 13.50 EUR is only a very slight premium on the three months volume weighted average price. I am aware that the two most recent analyst reports from Macquarie published in November 2010 and Merill Lynch published in Jan 2011 have price targets for Joyou of EUR 17.50 and EUR 18.00 respectively. Thus, I do not anticipate a high acceptance rate.
The offer price was determined by Grohe Holding GmbH and I was not involved in the decision making.

Will you or any of the Cai family sell any shares?
That is not what the intended partnership between me, my son Jilin Cai, and Grohe Holding GmbH is about. This transaction is about jointly creating value for Joyou and Grohe.
Me and my son Jilin Cai as major shareholders with 36.3% of Joyou AG´s shares will not tender any of our shares under the takeover offer. Further, under the non-binding LOI  signed with Grohe, I intend to further lock-up the majority of my shares into a joint venture partnership which will be aimed at growing Joyou AG´s business.
Thus, me and my son Jilin Cai, will directly and indirectly remain major shareholders of Joyou AG, with the same share holdings as we currently hold.
My brother Jiansheng Cai, who currently holds approximately 1,0% of Joyou´s shares, is not participating in the intended partnership with Grohe and will remain a free shareholder. I can not speak on his behalf but I do not believe that he wants to exit Joyou quickly.

What are the benefits of the intended takeover for Joyou?
Grohe is the number one brand around the world with a global market share of 8% in the sanitary fitting market, and is present in 130 countries globally. Joyou can benefit from a closer cooperation with Grohe in many ways.

The first tangible benefit is International sales of Joyou products. It is our aim to use the Grohe international channel and relationship network to market the Joyou products and explore profitable business together.

We expect that this will also lead to increased cooperative and potential in the China market, both in retail and projects.

There are also operational efficiencies that can be gained from this partnership, not least of which are channel management, development in retail and projects but also of course marketing and brand building.

In China the Joyou brand will gain substantial up lift by the ever closer cooperation with Grohe, which will not only be at the distributor and retail level, but also in the projects business. This is highly defendable Unique Selling Proposition. Now professional real estate developer purchasing managers have a single source for both their mid-end and high-end developments through this strong partnership, and a national after sales service network. I believe we are the only company in China that can really offer such a differentiated proposition. And to date we have received very positive feedback about this strong unique selling proposition.

Also on an international stage, Grohe is the market-leader, enjoys strong brand recognition. This partnership, by its very nature, will gain much media attention, which can only help sell Joyou branded products around the world. This all links back to why we did the IPO in Germany, and also using that as a platform for future global sales reach. After this step, I believe that our brand recognition globally will be much higher.

We expect to also be further involved in many forms of technology and skill transfer.

Getting back to more tangible benefits, Grohe currently source a significant amount for their products from China, and we are looking to shift much of this purchasing to Joyou.

So I think you can see that Joyou is gaining increased commitments from one of its anchor investors, and their long-term focus should continue to create significant shareholder value.

All in all, the partnership has the potential to support the dynamic growth of Joyou for many years to come. The tie up with Grohe, I believe can only serve as an approval of quality. After all, out of all of our shareholders, I believe that Grohe are the one who understand Joyou and the industry the most, second only to Joyou.

So who has committed to selling their shares?
This question, should really be directed to Grohe. All I can say is that Joyou AG was informed by Grohe that they have “already secured irrevocable commitments as well as other undertakings from current Joyou shareholders safeguarding voting rights of at least 30 % in Joyou AG”. As of the date of the IPO the pre-IPO series A and Series B investors, which included Grohe amounted to 29.1%, the Cai family 37.3%, and the free float 33.6% of Joyou AG’s shareholding.

What do you expect to happen to Joyou´s free-float and does Grohe intend to delist Joyou?
Based on the offer terms I assume that Joyou AG will retain a substantial amount of free float after Grohe Holding GmbH´s takeover offer. Thus, also a delisting of Joyou AG is not something that is planned, certainly not on my side. Also for Grohe Holding GmbH, as far as we know, this is not the case. GROHE intends to become a strategic anchor shareholder of Joyou AG.

Is Grohe Asia AG an operating entity of Grohe?
No, it is just a shareholding vehicle, a newly established fully owned subsidiary of Grohe Holding GmbH.

Will current Joyou shareholders be issued cash or shares in Grohe Asia?
The current shareholders will not be issued shares of Grohe Asia AG. After realisation of the partnership agreement, only me and my family and GROHE will be shareholders of Grohe Asia AG. The vehicle will be a partnership structure, and it’s shares will not be publicly traded.

fields.title: Joyou Opens First Brand Experience Centre
fields.content:
Hamburg, 9 March 2011. Joyou announced today that it has just opened its first Joyou Brand Experience Centre in China, in Hangzhou, Zhejiang province (1.5 hours from Shanghai), with a total floor space of 8,600 ft² (800 m²). The center was opened in cooperation with a regional distributor.

The opening of the Brand Experience Centre in the prestigious Derlook Decoration Mall (http://www.derlook.com), Hangzhou, was presided over by Mr. Jilin CAI, the COO of Joyou AG, together with Ms. Jingjing GUO, Joyou’s brand ambassador and Olympic gold medallist. It will concentrate on the customer’s experience, and their interaction with the brand. Apart from having different areas for different product segments, promoting the bathroom concept, it also has dedicated areas to showcase the history of the Joyou brand and the company behind it. It also includes extensive areas displaying the products and brand concept in the hotel and luxury apartment sector, aimed at introducing usage for professional project buyers.

“This is the first of several Joyou brand experience centers to be opened, and will play a pivotal role in developing the relationship between the Joyou brand and its target customer segment, both retail and project business. It will allow Joyou to engage much more directly with its customers, and is an essential move in our multi-channel distribution strategy, giving us stronger positioning in the retail and project landscape. Today’s empowered consumers are facing a plethora of choices, and the retailers of tomorrow will need us to focus on the overall customer experience and brand interaction to continue to remain competitive”, said Mr. Jianshe CAI.

fields.title: Joyou wins China Innovative Design Award Kapok Prize
fields.content:
Frankfurt, 14 March 2011. Joyou AG, a leading branded bathroom solution supplier in China, has been awarded the China Innovative Design Award Kapok Prize for two of its products.

Products of 1,120 companies from around the world took part in the competition, with prizes going to various companies. The Kapok Prize is the only annual international event of design with global synchronous promotion jointly acknowledged by three major authorized bodies of design, including ICSID, ICOGRADA and IFI.

The awarded products are the faucet “The Ladies” and the faucet “Miniature Garden”. The inspiration of “The Ladies” product series originates from the movements of female practitioners in Yoga. This led to the design of artistic faucets. The product inspiration for “Miniature Garden” comes from the actual mini-bonsai landscape reflecting the aesthetics with fundamental elements of nature and strong emotional feelings.

Joyou holds 96 patents for design, invention and utility model, and 42 patents are in the process of application, and have a total of 60 in-house Design and Research staff, and has nearly doubled its research and design budget in 2010.

fields.title: Joyou AG: Results 2010 exceed guidance and analyst’s estimates
fields.content:
Preliminary results 2010 and outlook 2011

Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 17 March 2011. Joyou AG, a leading bathroom solution supplier in China, has achieved better financial results in 2010 than expected: The company increased its sales in 2010 by 43% year on year to a total of EUR 246.6 million (2009: EUR 172.3 million). At EUR 71.7 million, total sales in the fourth quarter of 2010 were up 64% on the previous year. Operating income (EBIT) for full year 2010 increased by 11.5% to EUR 43.7 million, representing an EBIT margin of 17.7%. Net income grew at a higher rate of 49% to EUR 33.2 million in 2010 mainly due to EBIT and finance income increase, and obtaining a preferential income tax rate.

With these preliminary results for the financial year 2010 Joyou exceeds both the guidance on full year 2010 sales of EUR 230 million to EUR 240 million and the guidance on EBIT of EUR 40 million to EUR 42 million.

During the period under review there was a 6% currency devaluation of the Euro to RMB.

The strong sales growth reflects the substantial expansion of the distribution network and the company’s increased spending on marketing. In 2010, Joyou opened more than 1,000 stores. As of December 2010 the retail network comprised 3,596 Joyou branded stores and 143 Grohe branded stores.

Joyou expects dynamic growth to continue in 2011. The company has set its guidance for full year 2011 at sales of EUR 300 million to EUR 320 million and an EBIT of EUR 53 million to EUR 56 million. This guidance is based on an exchange rate of 1 EUR = 9 RMB.

The agreements include supplying faucets, showers and accessories.

The  new 430 room 5 Star Kempinski Hotel in Xiamen is to be opened in late 2011. It will be equipped  with a combination of Grohe and Joyou products. The  300 room 5 Star Westin Hotel in Xiamen is to be opened in December 2011 and will be supplied with Grohe products.
